mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_email, member_password, member_name, member_birth, member_phone, member_gender) values (#{memberEmail},#{memberPassword},#{memberName},#{memberBirth},#{memberPhone},#{memberGender})
mapper.select: select id, member_email, member_name, created_date, updated_date, member_birth, member_gender from tbl_member where member_email = #{memberEmail} and member_password = #{memberPassword} and member_status = 'active'

select id,member_email, member_name, member_status,member_phone,member_birth, member_kakao_email ,member_gender,member_provider, created_date, updated_date from tbl_member where tbl_member.member_kakao_email = #{memberKakaoEmail}
